channel.title: Rs2 Network-- Need A Server Hoster And More Crew For Designs
channel.description:
[img]http://i20.servimg.com/u/f20/11/26/05/93/rs2net11.png[/img]
This Is Our Site @ [url=http://www.rs2network.co.nr]www.rs2network.co.nr[/url]
[img]http://img53.imageshack.us/img53/6446/mnzs3.jpg[/img]
[u][b]And what we need is a good and trusted hoster to host on no-ip .. and they will become admin and get free RuneScape items!!!!
Please Join by either going to the site or either posting here.
If you want to join the desiging team plz visist the site Layout::
Your Name:: Your Age:: Were You In Our Community Before:: How Long You Can Host:: Possible To Host 24/7:: Comments::[/b][/u]
